incidents.name: Delay in Tableau Reports Refresh  times /  Revenue ETL runtime

incident_updates.body:
ETL run time and Tableau refresh extracts over the last days resumed to expected runtime.
The locks on the ETL run were resolved by restricting non  Xplenty ETL users run during ETL run time.

Issue is resolved

Tableau Performance resumed.
Last week Performance issues on Tableau side were addressed (Service restarted, Reports refresh schedule changed)

We are still addressing Long Revenue ETL run times which delay reports release according to schedule due to Exceeding load on our Data warehouse taking up resources from the Revenue ETL.

The issue is addressed by Data Infra team and Data OPS users are updated.

Hi All,

We are addressing a performance issue on our Datwarehouse(Redshift) impacting the planned refresh times on Reports causing delays in presenting refresh data.

The issue is across all reports and sites.

Data Infra team are investigating the issue. 

ETA for resolution  is TBD.

Facebook conversions are being updated successfully for the last week. 
Issue is resolved.

With any question please reach out to support@naturalint.com
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Hi All,

Update.

Issue persists.

We have uploaded manually conversion files but the Facebook platform isn't displaying it.

The issue is that Facebook are receiving events but stopped matching it since the 24/4

We are awaiting update from Facebook developer side (Roy in touch with Adam our AM at Facebook)

Hi All,

Since 23/4 Facebook postback are not updated on Facebook,
From our side it seems like there is no issue and all other Postback channels are updated.
The issue is still being investigated and we are communicating with Facebook directly.

The issue impacts MC team campagins optimizations.

incidents.name: Delay in Data validation update over the last days

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue. 
Actual last validated date for sites can be provided by Analytics / Data Ops team.

The issue has been identified and Data team are working on a fix. 
ETA: EOD

Following today Revenue ETL and validation review by DataOPS team we are investigating cases where validated sites were not marked as validated on Tableau.
The issue is investigated by Data-Infra and Data-Apps team.

We will followup with status,
A fix has been implemented into the Data Revenue ETL Data Validation packges and we are monitoring the current ETL progress . Following we will be able to verify issue resolved on production.

Hi All,
Over the last days Tableau Data validation service is not reliable.
The data validation service is responsible to tag sites as valid by date and updating it on Tableau.

The impact is that sites last valid date is populated with delay or not presenting it's last valid data on Tableau though from DataOPS team the data is valid.
We are aware of the confusion it may cause for biz users to understand the last day the data is valid.

Data-Apps and Data-Infra teams are working resolve it with Top Priority.
DataOps team are updated on the current status and can provide site owners update of the sites last valid date.

ETA: Today ASAP.

With any question please reach out to support@naturalint.com or advise with your DataOps owner

incidents.name: Bing - conversion Data update is Delayed

incident_updates.body: Data is updated on our end as well

Hi All,

Bing conversion data update is delayed due to an issue on their end.
Issue was resolved on Bing side and we will advise with Shared-services team on update to fetch the info again.

Description
Microsoft Advertising conversion data pipelines are currently delayed. Users monitoring conversion performance data via the Microsoft Advertising UI, API or reports may not see all of the latest conversion data.

https://status.ads.microsoft.com/
